titles.title: Cyber PIVOTT Act of 2025
Cyber PIVOTT Act of 2025
Providing Individuals Various Opportunities for Technical Training to Build a Skills-Based Cyber Workforce Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to provide for education and training programs and resources of the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
